import React,{useState} from 'react' import './bookings.css' import { Form,FormGroup,ListGroup,ListGroupItem,Button } from 'reactstrap' const Bookings = ({tour,avgRating}) => { const {price,reviews}=tour const [credentials,setCredentials]=useState({ userId:'01', userEmail:'example@iiita.ac.in', fullName:'', phone:'', guestSize:1, bookAt:'' }) const handleChange=e=>{ setCredentials(pre) } return (

${price} /per head
